entry.title: Test1:dear hard work
entry.content:
dear hard work

past

dear hard work,i used to hate you.
when you called my name,i hurried run away from you.
when i knew you were coming,i used to hadding from you.
when influence others to talk to me,i quickly made an excuse to get away from you.
i am afraid of the pain,because i did not want to get hurt.
i am afraid to faild,so i did not even try.

now

you make me who i am today.
because of you. i have this “never losing , never giving up” attitude.
quitting？
that is not in my volucabulary.
when they quit. i keep going.
when they sleep. i work harder.

future

dear hard work,
my dad was right about you:you do paid off.
i am no longer hidding form you.
i am wait for you.
matter of fact,
where are you. i need you.
because the hard work. i trust.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

LOVE C

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new “My New Post”

Run server

$ hexo server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy
